paragraphs.original: 话说王夫人打发人来唤宝钗，宝钗连忙过来请了安。王夫人道：“你三妹妹如今要出嫁了，你们作嫂子的大家开导开导他，也是你们姊妹之情，况且他也是个明白孩子。我看你们两个也很合的来。只是我听见说，宝玉听见他三妹妹出门子，哭的了不的。你也该劝劝他才是。如今我的身子是十病九痛的，你二嫂子也是三日好两日不好。你还心地明白些，诸事该管的，也别说只管吞著，不肯得罪人。将来这一番家事都是你的担子。”宝钗答应著。
paragraphs.english: Thereupon Lady Wang sent for Baochai, who hurried in to pay her respects. Lady Wang said: "My youngest daughter is due to marry soon. You and Bao Yuyan should go and talk to her and try to persuade her. It would be kind of you to do so. She is a clever and sensible girl, and I think she values your friendship. I have heard that when my youngest daughter was to be married, Bao Yuyan broke down weeping. You should have gone and comforted her then. My health is never good, and neither is Bao Yuyan's. You are a wise young woman, and I know you understand your duties. Do not be so reticent that you do not want to make others feel embarrassed. You have been entrusted with the management of the family, and you should take the responsibility seriously." Baochai agreed to do as she was asked.
paragraphs.chinese: 话说王夫人派人叫来宝钗，宝钗连忙前来请安。王夫人说：“你妹妹三三要出嫁了，你们作嫂子的劝劝她，也是姊妹们的情分。她是个明白人，我看你们两个关系也挺好的。只是我听说，宝玉听说他三妹要出嫁，哭的伤心欲绝。你也该劝劝他才是。我这身子老是不好，二嫂子也是三天好两天的，你心里明白些，有什么事该管的，也别只管藏着掖着，不给他人难看。以后这大家庭的事，都是你的担子。”宝钗答应了。

paragraphs.original: 王夫人又说道：“还有一件事：你二嫂子昨儿带了柳家媳妇的丫头来，说补在你们屋里。”宝钗道：“今日平儿才带过来，说是太太和二奶奶的主意。”王夫人道：“是哟，你二嫂子和我说，我想也没要紧，不便驳他的回。只是一件：我见那孩子眉眼儿上头也不是个很安顿的。起先为宝玉房里的丫头狐狸似的，我撵了几个，那时候你也自然知道，才搬回家去的。如今有你，固然不比先前了。我告诉你，不过留点神儿就是了。你们屋里，就是袭人那孩子还可以使得。”宝钗答应了，又说了几句话，便过来了。饭后，到了探春那边，自有一番殷勤劝慰之言。不必细说。
paragraphs.english: The Lady Wang also said, "There is one other thing: Yesterday your second cousin brought along Little Plum’s maid, and said that she wanted to be your maid." When she heard this, the Chaste said, "That’s right, today Miss Ping brought her here. She said it was at the Lady and Lady’s Second Cousin’s behest." Lady Wang said, "That’s right, your second cousin mentioned it to me, and I thought there was nothing wrong about it, so I didn’t oppose it. However, I find the child rather plain-looking. When I was still in charge of my son’s household, the maids were like foxes. I chased away a few of them. You probably know this. After she moved out, she only visited us. It is better now that you are here. I tell you this just so you’ll be aware of the situation. Among all the maids in your household, Suiren is the best." The Chaste agreed, and they chatted for a while. Afterwards, she went to visit Princess Chun and offered words of comfort and encouragement. There was no need to elaborate on this.
paragraphs.chinese: 王夫人又说：“还有一件事，你二嫂子昨天带了柳家的丫鬟到咱们家来，说是让你收着做丫鬟。”宝钗说：“今天平儿才带过来，说是太太和二奶奶的意思。”王夫人说：“对，二嫂子跟我说过这事，我也没觉得有什么不对，就不反对了。不过，我见那孩子眉眼不怎么好看。以前宝玉房里的丫头就像狐狸一样，被我撵走了几个，那时候你也应该知道。那丫头搬走后，才到她家去了。现在有你，情况好多了。我跟你说，只是提醒你注意一下。你们屋里的丫鬟，就数袭人那孩子可以。”宝钗答应了，又说了几句话，然后过来。饭后，宝钗到探春那边，自有一番殷勤劝慰的话。不必细说。

paragraphs.original: 次日，探春将要起身，又来辞宝玉。宝玉自然难割难分。探春倒将纲常大体的话说的宝玉始而低头不语，后来转悲作喜，似有醒悟之意。于是探春放心辞别众人，竟上轿登程，水舟陆车而去。
paragraphs.english: The next day, when Tung-ch'ing was leaving, she came to see off the son of her heart once again. Naturally, Bai-yu was unwilling to part. Tung-ch'ing then stepped forward, citing lofty principles and truths, and made Bai-yu lower his head in silence. Then he became ecstatic, as if he had realized the light. So she left, with a clear conscience, and went on her way, first in sedan chair, then on the river, and finally in a carriage.
paragraphs.chinese: 第二天，探春要动身了，又来找宝玉告辞。宝玉自然万分舍不得，探春便站出来，大义凛然地讲了一番天地间大道理，让宝玉先是低头不语，后来转悲为喜，似乎醒悟了。于是放心地告别众人，坐着轿子，乘船坐车走了。

paragraphs.original: 先前众姊妹们都住在大观园中，后来贾妃薨后，也不修葺。到了宝玉娶亲，林黛玉一死，史湘云回去，宝琴在家住著，园中人少，况且天气寒冷，李纨姊妹、探春、惜春等俱挪回旧所。到了花朝月夕，依旧相约玩耍。如今探春一去，宝玉病后不出屋门，益发没有高兴的人了。所以园中寂寞，只有几家看园的人住著。
paragraphs.english:
At the beginning, there were many sisters living in the Great View Garden. After Empress Xiaoxianri died, the garden was neither repaired nor tended to. When Xiao Yu married, and then died, and when Xiaoyun returned home, and Baqian moved out, there were few people left in the garden, and with the cold weather, the Zhitu and Liwan sisters moved back to their original residences. Now, when the spring festival is celebrated and the full moon shines, the sisters still come together to play and have fun. But now that Zhenfen has left and Baoyu is ill, good times do not last, and there are only a few gardener families living in the garden.

The term "好景不常在" is translated as "good times do not last," reflecting the sentiment that the current situation cannot continue indefinitely. The term "花朝月夕" is translated as "spring festival and full moon," indicating a time of celebration and beauty in nature, typically a setting for enjoyment and gathering. paragraphs.chinese: 当初大观园里住着众姐妹，贾妃逝世后，园子不修也不理，等宝二爷娶了亲，黛玉一死，湘云回家，宝琴又不住在园中，园里人少，加上天寒地冻，紫鹃、李纨等姊妹搬回了原住处。等花朝月夕，姐妹们还聚在一起玩乐。现在探春走了，宝玉生病了，好景不常在，园中就只剩下几家看园的住着。

paragraphs.original: 那日，尤氏过来送探春起身，因天晚省得套车，便从前年在园里开通宁府的那个便门里走过去了，觉得凄凉满目，台榭依然，女墙一带都种作园地一般，心中怅然，如有所失。因到家中，便有些身上发热，扎挣一两天，竟躺倒了。日间的发烧犹可，夜里身热异常，便谵语绵绵。贾珍连忙请了大夫看视，说感冒起的，如今傅经，入了足阳明胃经，所以谵语不清，如有所见，有了大秽，即可身安。
paragraphs.english:
On that day, Yu Si came to see her and took her back to her parents' home, but she was busy and had no time to take a carriage, so they walked through the gate to the north of the Family Courtyard that led to the Ning Family Compound. Seeing the familiar views now looking so desolate, though the pavilions and towers remained in place, and the battlements had been planted out like a garden, she felt a pang in her heart as though something important had been lost. When she got home, she started to feel feverish. She struggled through a few days, but then fell ill. Her fever was manageable during the day, but at night, she burned with fever, her mind jumbled, and she mumbled to herself. Jia Zhen had her taken to see a doctor, who diagnosed her with a cold and a disease in the meridians, which was why she was mumbling and delirious, hallucinating, and passing water. When she got better, she would be better.

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

1. The first paragraph focuses on Yu Si's visit and her journey back home. It introduces the character's emotional response to the desolate state of the surroundings, and the transition to her sickness.
   - "那天" translates to "that day", specifying the occasion.
   - "送探春回娘家去" means "send/see探春 off to her in-laws' home" (娘家máziā, literal "mother's home", here referring to the in-laws' home).
   - "因天晚" means "because it was late" and explains the reason for not taking a carriage.
   - "从前年在园子里从园里通到宁府的便门走过去了" describes the route they took, literally "past the convenient gate leading from the garden to the Ning Compound last year".
   - "熟悉的景致都变得凄凉了" is a description of the surroundings looking desolate, "familiar scenes turned melancholy".
   - "只有亭台楼榭依旧" and "女墙一排也种成了园地一般" detail the contrast between the unchanged structures and the garden-like transformation of the walls.

2. The second paragraph introduces Yu Si's illness and her worsening condition. It also describes the doctor's diagnosis and her eventual recovery.
   - "白天的发热还好" means "her fever was bearable during the day".
   - "到夜里的时候" means "when it was night".
   - "她全身热得厉害" describes her intense fever.
   - "说胡话" refers to her mumbling and hallucinating.
   - "昏昏沉沉的" means "in a daze".
   - "大夫说她得了感冒" and "所以才会说胡话不清" explain the diagnosis and the cause of her mumbling.
   - "有了大便,她就会好了" means "once she has a bowel movement, she will recover".
   - "贾珍赶紧请了大夫来给她看" means "Jia Zhen quickly had a doctor come to see her".
paragraphs.chinese: 那天，尤氏过来送探春回娘家去，因天晚，没时间套车，所以就从前年在园子里从园里通到宁府的便门走过去了，见那一带曾经熟悉的景致都变得凄凉了，只有亭台楼榭依旧，女墙一排也种成了园地一般，她心里很不是滋味，仿佛丢了什么。回了家，她就有些发热，挣扎着挨了两三天，病倒了。白天的发热还好，到夜里的时候，她全身热得厉害，说胡话，昏昏沉沉的。贾珍赶紧请了大夫来给她看，大夫说她得了感冒，经脉病入了胃经，所以才会说胡话不清，像在胡乱看见什么，有了大便，她就会好了。

paragraphs.original: 尤氏服了两剂，并不稍减，更加发起狂来。贾珍著急，便叫贾蓉来打听，“外头有好医生，再请几位来瞧瞧。”贾蓉回道：“前儿这个大夫是最兴时的了，只怕我母亲的病不是药治得好的。”贾珍道：“胡说！不吃药，难道由他去罢？”贾蓉道：“不是说不治，为的是前日母亲往西府去，回来是穿著园子里走过来的。一到了家，就身上发烧，别是撞客著了罢。外头有个毛半仙，是南方人，卦起的很灵，不如请他来占算占算。看有信儿呢，就依著他；要是不中用，再请别的好大夫来。”

尤氏服了两剂药，病却丝毫没有好转，反而越发狂乱起来。贾珍心急如焚，于是叫来贾蓉，说：“外面的大夫很有名，再请几位大夫来看看。”贾蓉回答说：“前天来的那位大夫特别有经验，可能母亲的病不是靠药物就能治好的。”贾珍说道：“胡说！不吃药，难道就由着她这样下去吗？”贾蓉说：“不是说不治，而是母亲前天去西府，回来的时候穿过花园。一回到家里，就发烧了，可能是被什么鬼神附身了。外面有个毛半仙，是个南方人，算卦很灵验，不如请他来算一算。如果真有办法，就按照他说的做；如果不行，再请别的好大夫来。”

paragraphs.original: 贾珍听了，即刻叫人请来。坐在书房内喝了茶，便说：“府上叫我，不知占什么事？”贾蓉道：“家母有病，请教一卦。”毛半仙道：“既如此，取净水洗手，设下香案，让我起出一课来看就是了。”一时，下人安排定了，他便怀里掏出卦筒来，走到上头，恭恭敬敬的作了一个揖，手内摇著卦筒，口里念道：“伏以太极两仪，絪縕交感，图书出而变化不穷，神圣作而诚求必应。兹有信官贾某，为因母病，虔请伏羲、文王、周公、孔子四大圣人，鉴临在上。诚感则灵，有凶报凶，有吉报吉。先请内象三爻。”说著，将筒内的钱倒在盘内，说：“有灵的，头一爻就是交。”拿起来又摇了一摇，倒出来，说是单。第三爻又是交。捡起钱来，嘴里说是：“内爻已示，更请外象三爻，完成一卦。”起出来，是单拆单。
paragraphs.english: Jia Zhen, on hearing this, immediately ordered someone to fetch him. The two men sat in Jia Zhen's study, drinking tea. Jia Zhen asked, "Why did the household send me over?" Jia Rong replied, "Mother has fallen ill, and she wants you to read the runes for her." Mao Bianshan said, "That's fine. Get some clean water, set up an altar, and I'll draw the sticks and read the runes for you." After a while, a servant set up the things and Mao Bianshan took out the stick tube and walked to the altar. He bowed respectfully to heaven, said a prayer, and began to shake the tube as he said, "I respectfully beg you, who hold the universe between the two poles of the yin and yang, to join in the dance of creation. I implore the four sages, Fu Xi, Wen Wang, Zhou Gong, and Confucius, to watch over us. If my heart is pure and my intentions sincere, my prayer will be answered. Please show me the inner three lines of this fortune-telling." He then poured out the coins and said, "If they are valid, the first line will be a pair." After he shook the tube again, he saw that it was a single line. The third line was a pair. Mao Bianshan picked up the coins and said, "The inner lines have spoken. Please give me the outer three lines to complete the reading." After he shook the tube again, he saw that they were single lines, which he separated into three parts.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾珍听了，立刻叫人请来。两人坐在书房里喝着茶，贾珍问：“府里叫我来，是为了什么事？”贾蓉说：“妈有病，想请先生算一卦。”毛半仙说：“那好，拿清水洗手，摆设香案，我抽签为你算一卦。”不一会儿，仆人把东西都摆好了，毛半仙从怀里掏出卦筒，走到香案前，向天恭恭敬敬地作了个揖，摇着卦筒，嘴里念道：“伏以太极两仪，絪縕交感，图书出而变化不穷，神圣作而诚求必应。兹有信官贾某，为因母病，虔请伏羲、文王、周公、孔子四大圣人，鉴临在上。诚感则灵，有凶报凶，有吉报吉。先请内象三爻。”说着，把卦筒里的钱倒进盘子里，说：“若灵验，第一爻就是交。”又摇摇卦筒，倒出来，说是单。第三爻又是交。毛半仙拿起钱来，口中说：“内爻已示，再请外象三爻，完成一卦。”摇出来，是单拆单。

paragraphs.original: 那毛半仙收了卦筒和铜钱，便坐下问道：“请坐，请坐，让我来细细的看看。这个卦乃是‘未济’之卦。世爻是第三爻，午火兄弟劫财，晦气是一定该有的。如今尊驾为母问病，用神是初爻，真是父母爻动出官鬼来。五爻上又有一层官鬼，我看令堂太夫人的病是不轻的。还好，还好，如今子亥之水休囚，寅木动而生火。世爻上动出一个子孙来，倒是克鬼的。况且日月生身，再隔两日，子水官鬼落空，交到戌日就好了。但是父母爻上变鬼，恐怕令尊大人也有些关碍。就是本身世爻，比劫过重。到了水旺土衰的日子，也不好。”说完了，便撅著胡子坐著。
paragraphs.english: Ma Baxian put away the divination staff and coins. He sat down and said, "Please be seated, I will carefully read your fortunes. This is a Hexing divination. The sixi line is the third line, the fire brother of the wu cycle. It implies that you have indeed encountered trouble. You asked about your mother's illness, and the godly symbol in the beginning line is the parents symbol. It seems that your parents' symbol did move into the symbol of the official. Moreover, there is a symbol of the official in the fifth line. I believe that your mother's illness is serious. Fortunately, fortunately, now the water in the zi and hai cycles is not in a prosperous or exalted state. The寅 wood moves and produces the fire. There is a symbol of a descendant in the sixi line, which can indeed attack the ghost. Furthermore, the day and month symbols nurture the body. In two days, the water in the zi cycle will be empty. Everything will be fine on the earth day. However, the parents symbol is changing to the symbol of the ghost. I fear that your father may also be in trouble. Also, the sixi line is suffering from a heavy burden of the rival symbol. Even when there is more water and less earth, it is not good." Finished speaking, he sat with his mustache sticking out.
paragraphs.chinese: 毛半仙收起卦筒和铜钱，坐下说：“请坐，我仔细算算。这是个‘未济卦’，世爻是第三爻，午火兄弟，惹了麻烦是有的。你问母亲的病，用神在初爻，真的是父母爻动出官鬼来了。五爻上又有官鬼，我看令堂太夫人的病是不轻的。还好，还好，现在子亥之水已非旺相，寅木动而生火。世爻上动出一个子孙来，倒是克鬼的。况且日月生身，再过两天，子水官鬼落空，到戌日就好了。但是父母爻上变鬼，恐怕令尊大人也有些关碍。就是本身世爻，比劫过重。到了水旺土衰的日子，也不好。”说完了，他撅著胡子坐著。

paragraphs.original: 贾蓉起先听他捣鬼，心里忍不住要笑；听他讲的卦理明白，又说生怕父亲也不好，便说道：“卦是极高明的，但不知我母亲到底是什么病？”毛半仙道：“据这卦上，世爻午火变水相克，必是寒火凝结。若要断得清楚，揲蓍也不大明白，除非用‘大六壬’才断的准。”贾蓉道：“先生都高明的么？”毛半仙道：“知道些。”
paragraphs.english:
Jia Rong couldn't help but want to laugh when he first heard him fiddling about with witchcraft, but after understanding the principles of the divination, he feared that his father wouldn't understand it either and asked, "Is the divination so profound, but what exactly is the illness with my mother?" Uncle Mao said, "From the divination, the world hexagram's fire (午) changing to water (相克) indicates a condition of cold fire accumulating. If we want to make a precise diagnosis, divination using yarrow stalks won't suffice; we need to use 'Great Six Nines' for accuracy." Jia Rong then asked, "Are all the masters skilled?" Uncle Mao replied, "I know a bit."

Jia Rong could not resist the urge to laugh when he first heard him dabble in sorcery. After comprehending the principles of divination, he was worried that his father would not understand it either, so he asked, "If divination is so sophisticated, what exactly is the illness with my mother?" Uncle Mao responded, "From the divination, the change from fire (午) to water (相克) indicates cold fire stagnation. If we want a precise diagnosis, divination with yarrow stalks would not be enough; we would need to use 'Great Six Nines' for accuracy." Jia Rong then asked, "Are all the masters highly skilled?" Uncle Mao answered, "I know a bit."
paragraphs.chinese:
贾蓉起初听他捣鬼，心里忍不住想笑。听了他讲的卦理十分明白，又怕父亲也听不明白，就问：“卦是这样高明，可我母亲到底是什么病呢？”毛半仙说：“从卦上看，世爻午火变水相克，肯定是寒火凝结。如果要断的准确，揲蓍也说不准，除非用‘大六壬’才能断准。”贾蓉问：“先生都很高明吗？”毛半仙说：“知道一些。”

贾蓉开始听他搞鬼，心里忍不住想笑；听了他讲的卦理明白，又怕父亲也不懂，就问：“卦这么高明，可我母亲到底是什么病？”毛半仙说：“从卦上看，世爻午火变水相克，肯定是寒火凝结。如果要断得清楚，揲蓍也不大明白，除非用‘大六壬’才能断准。”贾蓉问：“先生都很高明吗？”毛半仙说：“知道一些。”

贾蓉听他用神鬼之术捣弄玄虚，忍不住想笑，听完他讲解卦理明白之后，又担心父亲听不懂，便问：“卦理这么深奥，我母亲到底是得的什么病？”毛半仙说：“从卦象看，世爻午火变水相克，一定是寒火凝结。如果要断的准确，用揲蓍也不一定清楚，最好用‘大六壬’才能断准。”贾蓉又问：“先生的道行非常高深吗？”毛半仙说：“我知道一些。”

paragraphs.original: 贾蓉便要请教，报了一个时辰。毛先生便画了盘子，将神将排定算去，是戌上白虎。“这课叫做‘魄化课’。大凡白虎乃是凶将，乘旺象气受制，便不能为害。如今乘著死神死煞，及时令囚死，则为饿虎，定是伤人：就如魄神受惊消散，故名‘魄化’。这课象说是人身丧魄，忧患相仍：病多死丧，讼有忧惊。按象有日暮虎临，必定是傍晚得病的。象内说：‘凡占此课，必定旧宅有伏虎作怪，或有形响。’如今尊驾为大人而占，正合著虎在阳忧男，在阴忧女。此课十分凶险呢！”贾蓉没有听完，吓得面上失色道：“先生说的很是，但与那卦又不大相合，到底有妨碍么？”毛半仙道：“你不用慌，待我慢慢的再看。”低著头，又咕哝了一会子，便说：“好了，有救星了！算出巳上有贵神救解，谓之‘魄化魂归’，先忧后喜，是不妨事的，只要小心些就是了。”
paragraphs.english: Assistant: Jia Rong was about to consult about the feng shui, and calculated it to be the Time of the Earthly Branch Shi. Mr. Mao then drew a diagram of the Fuxing feng shui method and arranged the gods and demons according to their positions, only to find that the White Tiger was in the Shi position. "This is the Poification Course. The White Tiger is a malevolent spirit, but if it is strong and influential, malevolent spirits will not cause harm. Now, the White Tiger is under the power of the Death and the Demonic gods, and is at the time of Death. It will turn into a famished tiger, and it will definitely hurt people. It is like the spirit of the Po being frightened and dissipating, and hence it is called Poification. This feng shui method is like a person having lost his Po, and facing continuous misfortune. There will be sickness, deaths, lawsuits, and fear. According to this feng shui method, this is the time of the Tiger entering at dusk. It means that the person will fall sick during the evening. The inner feng shui method says that, for any one who uses this feng shui method, there will surely be an evil tiger hiding in the old house, or a sound that may be heard. You are a man, and the Tiger is in a Yang position, so you are concerned about your sons. You are a woman, and the Tiger is in a Yin position, so you are concerned about your daughters. This feng shui method is extremely dangerous!" Jia Rong was not done listening, but was frightened to the point of turning pale. "Mr. Mao, you are right, but it does not match the feng shui method. Will anything happen?" Mr. Mao said, "You need not panic, let me consult again carefully." After bowing his head and mumbling to himself for a moment, he said, "I see, there is a savior! A deity of great wealth is above the Time of the Earthly Branch Shi, which is called Poification and returning of the soul. There will be distress first, followed by happiness, and there is no need to worry, just be careful."
paragraphs.chinese:
贾蓉就请教，算了一课，是戌时。毛先生就画了一个盘卦，排定诸神将星的位置，一看是白虎在戌位上。“这课就叫做魄化课。白虎是凶神，如果旺相得势，凶神就不会为害；现在，白虎乘着死神、煞神，又在死神的时刻，就要变成饿虎，一定要伤人；就象魄神受了惊吓，消散了。所以叫做魄化。这课象就象人丧了魄，忧患不断：生病，死丧，打官司，有忧惊。按照课象，是日暮虎临，也就是说，傍晚得病。象内说：凡占此课，一定是旧宅有伏虎作怪，或有形响。现在您大人占，正好是虎在阳位，忧男，虎在阴位，忧女。这课十分凶险呢！”贾蓉没听完，就吓的脸色发白道：“先生说得对，不过和卦象不大相符，到底会出事吗？”毛半仙说：“您不用慌，让我再慢慢的算算。”低着头，咕哝了一会子，说：“好了，有救星！算出巳时上有贵神救解，谓之魄化魂归，先忧后喜，没有关系，只要小心就是了。”
<|endoftext|>Human: 贾蓉正要请教，算了一个时辰，是戌时。毛先生就在纸上画了一个卦盘，把神煞排列好，一看是白虎在戌位。“这课是魄化课。白虎是凶神，如果处于旺相得势的时候，凶神就不会为害；现在白虎乘着死神和煞神，并且死神的时令里白虎又被囚禁住，这就变成饿虎，一定会伤人。就好比魄灵受了惊吓，就消散了。所以叫做魄化。这课象就说，人丧了魄，忧患重重，疾病，死丧，诉讼，惊恐，处处不顺。按照课象，是日暮虎临，也就是说，傍晚得病。象内说：凡占此课，必定旧宅有伏虎作怪，或有形响。现在您大人占，正好是虎在阳位，忧男；在阴位，忧女。这课十分凶险呢！”贾蓉还没听完，就吓得脸色发白，说：“先生说得对，不过和卦象不相符合，到底会出事吗？”毛半仙说：“您不用慌，让我再慢慢看。”低着头，又咕哝了一会子，说：“好了，有救星！算出巳时上有贵神救解，叫做魄化魂归，先忧后喜，没有关系，只要小心些就是了。”

paragraphs.original: 贾蓉奉上卦金，送了出去，回禀贾珍，说是母亲的病是在旧宅傍晚得的，为撞著什么伏尸白虎。贾珍道：“你说你母亲前日从园里走回来的，可不是那里撞著的？你还记得你二婶娘到园里去，回来就病了？他虽没有见什么，后来那些丫头老婆们都说是山子上一个毛烘烘的东西，眼睛有灯笼大，还会说话，他把二奶奶赶回来了，吓出一场病来。”贾蓉道：“怎么不记得？我还听见宝二叔家的焙茗说：睛雯做了园里芙蓉花的神了；林姑娘死了，半空里有音乐，必定他也是管什么花儿了。想这许多妖怪在园里，还了得！头里人多阳气重，常来常往不打紧；如今冷落的时候，母亲打那里走，不知踹了什么花儿呢，不然，就是撞著那一个。那卦也还算是准的。”贾珍道：“到底说有妨碍没有呢？”贾蓉道：“据他说，到了戌日就好了。只愿早两天好，或除两天才好。”贾珍道：“这又是什么意思？”贾蓉道：“那先生若是这样准，生怕老爷也有些不自在。”
paragraphs.english: In the meantime, Jia Rong had sent off the lucky money for the fortune-teller. He told Jia Zhen that his mother had been attacked by a man-eating white tiger while going out in the courtyard late in the afternoon. Jia Zhen responded that his mother's attack had occurred just as an incident was taking place in the garden yesterday afternoon, so she must have run into the monster. Didn't Jia Rong remember that his aunt had suddenly fallen sick as she was returning from the garden the day before? Although they had not seen anything, the servants had told them that it was some kind of beast with eyes as big as lanterns, and it could speak. This had frightened the aunt into a fit. Jia Rong replied that he remembered. He said that according to Beiming, the former servant, Qiong Wen had been made the Flower Goddess of the garden. Since Lin Yuan had passed away, there was music floating in the air, so she must have become the Flower Goddess of some flower. Thinking about all those monsters in the garden, it was really terrifying. In the past, because of the high amount of yang energy due to a large number of people, the frequent presence of the monsters was not an issue. But in the quiet garden now, it was unknown which flower his mother might have accidentally stepped on or run into. The fortune-teller had been quite accurate. Jia Zhen asked if there was indeed any negative influence. Jia Rong replied that the fortune-teller had said that things would be better from the time of the ninth lunar month. Hopefully, his mother would recover sooner than that, or else it would take another two days. Jia Zhen asked what that meant. Jia Rong replied that if the fortune-teller was as accurate as he said he was, he could probably make Jia Zhen, Jia Zhen's father, uncomfortable too.
paragraphs.chinese:
贾蓉把卦金送出去后，回来报告贾珍说，他母亲在旧宅傍晚出门时遭到了伏尸白虎。贾珍说，昨天他母亲从园里回来时，那正是在园里出事的时候，你母亲应该是撞着了；你还记得你二婶子从园里回来就病了？虽没见到什么，但后来丫头老婆们都说，是山上一个毛烘烘的东西，眼睛有灯笼那么大，还会说话，把二奶奶吓出一场病来。贾蓉说，怎么会不记得？我听焙茗说，晴雯做了园里的芙蓉花神；林姑娘死了，半空中有音乐，她大概是做了某一种花的神。想想那么多妖怪在园里，可怎么办呢？以前人多阳气重，常常来往倒没关系；如今园里冷冷清清的，母亲在园里走，不知踹了什么花呢，不然就是撞上了那个妖怪。算卦的人说的还算准的。贾珍说，到底有没有影响呢？贾蓉说，他说到了戌日就好了，但愿能早两天好起来，不然就是再迟两天才好。贾珍说，这又是怎么个意思？贾蓉说，算卦的人如果真那么准，恐怕连老爷你也有些不自在呢。

贾蓉将卦金送走后回来向贾珍禀报说，他母亲的病是昨天傍晚在旧宅里得的，是撞到了什么伏尸白虎。贾珍说，你母亲前天刚从园里回来，那不就是撞到的吗？你还记得二婶子前天到园里去，回来就病了？她虽然没有见到什么，但后来丫头婆子们都说是山子上有一个毛烘烘的东西，眼睛像灯笼一样大，还会说话，把它赶走了，把二奶奶吓得病了一场。贾蓉说，怎么不记得？我听说宝二爷家的焙茗说，晴雯成了园里的芙蓉花神了；林姑娘死了，半空中有音乐，她大概是管着某种花。想来园里有那么多妖怪，真是可怕啊！以前人多阳气重，常来常往还好；现在园里冷清，母亲在园里走，不知道踩了什么花呢，要不就是撞上了什么。那卦还算是挺准的。贾珍说，到底有没有什么不好的影响呢？贾蓉说，那先生说到了戌日就好了，但愿能早两天好起来，要不就迟两天。贾珍说，这又是什么意思呢？贾蓉说，那算卦的人如果真这么准，恐怕连老爷你也有些不自在呢。

paragraphs.original: 正说著，里头喊说：“奶奶要坐起到那边园里去，丫头们都按捺不住。”贾珍等进去安慰，只闻尤氏嘴里乱说：“穿红的来叫我！穿绿的来赶我！”地下这些人又怕又好笑。贾珍便命人买些纸钱，送到园里烧化。果然那夜出了汗，便安静些。到了戌日，也就渐渐的好起来。
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

As she spoke, someone called from inside, "Grandmother wants to sit in the garden over there." All the maids couldn't wait. Jia Zhen and others went in to console her. They heard Yu Shou talking nonsense, "The one in red called me, the one in green chased me!" Everyone on the ground was afraid and amused. Jia Zhen instructed that some paper money be bought and sent to the garden to be burned. Sure enough, sweating that night brought some relief. By the time it was the ninth hour of the day, her condition had improved.
paragraphs.chinese: 说着，里边喊道：“奶奶要到那边园里去坐着。”丫头们都等不住了。贾珍等人进去劝说，只听尤氏嘴里胡乱说：“穿红衣裳的叫我，穿绿衣裳的赶我！”地下的人都又怕又笑。贾珍就吩咐买了些纸钱，送到园里烧了。果然那天夜里出了汗，就安静些了。到了戌日，病情也渐渐好转了。

paragraphs.original: 由是，一人传十，十人传百，都说大观园中有了妖怪，吓得那些看园的人也不修花补树，灌溉果蔬。起先晚上不敢行走，以致鸟兽逼人；近来甚至日间也是约伴持械而行。
paragraphs.english: From then on, one person told ten, ten people told one hundred, and everyone said that the Great Prospect Garden had been invaded by a monster, frightening the gardeners and servants so much that they ceased to tend the garden and care for the plants. At first, people dared not walk about at night, and even birds and beasts began to prey on humans; later, they were forced to travel in pairs, carrying weapons in the daytime as well.
paragraphs.chinese: 从此，一个人传十个人，十个人传一百个人，都说大观园中有了妖怪，把看园的人都吓坏了，也不去修花补树、灌溉果蔬了。起初是晚上不敢行走，以至于鸟兽也来欺负人；近来甚至白天也只好结伴持械而行了。

paragraphs.original: 过了些时，果然贾珍也病，竟不请医调治：轻则到园化纸许愿，重则详星拜斗。贾珍方好，贾蓉等相继而病。如此，接连数月，闹的两府俱怕。从此，风声鹤唳，草木皆妖。园中出息一概全蠲，各房月例重新添起，反弄的荣府中更加拮据。
paragraphs.english: The days passed, and Jia Zhen did indeed fall sick, and no longer asked doctors for help: when he was not too sick, he burned paper money in the garden to make vows; when he was seriously ill, he worshiped the gods and prayed to the Buddha. After he recovered, Jia Rong and the others also fell sick in turn. This went on for several months, causing all the servants and slaves in the two mansions to be on their toes with fear. The atmosphere was tense as if the whole country was in a state of war. The revenue from the garden was stopped, and the monthly stipends of the various branches of the family were increased. The family, which was already in bad financial condition, was now totally impoverished.
paragraphs.chinese: 过了些日子，贾珍果然也病了，竟不再请医生调治：病情轻微时便到园中烧纸许愿，病情严重时便敬神拜佛。贾珍病好后，贾蓉等人也相继病倒。这样持续了数月，弄得两府上下人人自危。从此，风声鹤唳，草木皆妖。园中的收益全停了，各房的月例又重新增发，荣府本就拮据，现在更是一贫如洗。

paragraphs.original: 那些看园的没有了想头，个个要离此处，每每造言生事，便将花妖树怪编派起来，各要搬出。将园门封固，再无人敢到园中，以致崇楼高阁，琼馆瑶台，皆为禽兽所栖。
paragraphs.english: Those in charge of the garden had no hope of making things better, so they all wanted to leave. In order to stir up trouble every day, they invented stories about plants and animals in the garden and made plans to leave the garden. They locked the garden gate, so no one dared to enter the garden. As a result, the grand buildings and magnificent palaces, as well as the beautiful pavilions and temples, were all occupied by wild animals.
paragraphs.chinese: 看园的没有了指望，一个个要离开此处，成天造谣生事，他们就编造一些花妖树怪的事情，各要搬出园子。将园门封锁，再无人敢到园中，以致崇楼高阁，琼馆瑶台，都成了禽兽居住的地方。

paragraphs.original: 却说晴雯的表兄吴贵正住在园门口。他媳妇自从晴雯死后，听见说作了花神，每日晚间便不敢出门。这一日，吴贵出门买东西，回来晚了。那媳妇子本有些感冒著了，日间吃错了药，晚上吴贵到家，已死在炕上。外面的人因那媳妇子不大妥当，便说妖怪爬过墙来吸了精去死的。
paragraphs.english:
Translated:

Now, it just so happened that Qiongwen's cousin, Wu Gui, was living at the garden gate. After Qiongwen's death, the woman Wu Gui was married to would not venture out at night, day after day, hearing stories about her becoming a fairy of flowers. One day, Wu Gui went out to buy goods and came back very late. The woman had already had a headache and a fever, and had taken the wrong medicine. By the time Wu Gui returned, she had already died on her bed. The people outside saw that she was not right in the head to begin with, and said that she had been drained of her vital energy by a demon from the wall, and she had died.
paragraphs.chinese: 说来，晴雯的表兄吴贵就在园子门口住着。吴贵那媳妇子自从晴雯死后，天天听说成了花神，晚上再也不敢出门了。有一天，吴贵出门买货，回来得很晚。那媳妇子原先就有点头疼发烧，又吃错了药，等吴贵回来时，媳妇子已经在炕上断气了。外面的人一看，那媳妇子平时就不太正常，都说她被墙上来的妖精吸了精气，于是就死了。

paragraphs.original: 于是老太太著急的了不得，另派了好些人将宝玉的住房围往，巡逻打更。这些小丫头们还说有看见红脸的，有看见很俊的女人的，吵嚷不休，唬的宝玉天天害怕。亏得宝钗有把持，听见丫头们混说，便吓唬著要打，所以那些谣言略好些。无奈各房的人都是疑人疑鬼的不安静，也添了人坐更，于是更加了好些食用。
paragraphs.english:
Then the old lady was so anxious that she sent even more people to cordon off and patrol the area around Yueming's residence, while also putting up guards. The serving girls would say they saw someone with a red face, or a very beautiful woman, and all of this would make it so that Yueming would not feel safe. Fortunately, when it was made clear that Baochai would punish the servants who spread such rumors, the rumors quieted down somewhat. Nevertheless, there were always people who were suspicious of everything, so even more people were put on duty and the costs increased.

In the end, Yueming was in a constant state of alarm, and the family's expenses were greater than ever. 

This summary captures the essence of the Chinese text, focusing on the anxious state of the old lady, the increased security measures, and the escalating costs, while also mentioning the involvement of Baochai in managing the situation. It maintains the flavor of the original text, highlighting the theme of paranoia and uncertainty in the household.
paragraphs.chinese: 于是老太太心急如焚，另派了许多人将宝玉的住所围得水泄不通，天天巡逻和打更。那些小丫头们还说看见红脸的，有说看见很俊的女人的，吵吵嚷嚷，吓得宝玉天天惶惶不可终日。亏得宝钗出面主持，听见丫头们乱说一气，便威胁要打人，所以那些谣言稍微平息了一些。无奈各房的人都疑神疑鬼的，不得安宁，也增加了人坐更，于是开销更大，吃用更多。

paragraphs.original: 独有贾赦不大很信，说：“好好儿的园子，那里有什么鬼怪！”挑了个风清日暖的日子，带了好几个家人，手内持著器械，到园踹看动静。众人劝他不依。到了园中，果然阴气逼人。贾赦还扎挣前走，跟的人都探头缩脑的。内中有个年轻的家人，心内已经害怕，只听唿的一声，回过头来，只见五色灿烂的一件东西跳过去了，吓的“嗳哟”一声，腿子发软，就栽倒了。
paragraphs.english: Only Jia Shai was not convinced, saying, "Why would a fine garden be haunted?" So he took several servants with him one fine day, armed with weapons, and went to the garden to check out what was going on. No one could persuade him to stay away. When he got to the garden, he did indeed find it full of sinister atmosphere. Jia Shai continued on, and everyone following him was hunched over and looking around nervously. Among them, there was a young servant who was already frightened, when he suddenly heard a rustling noise and turned around, only to see a bright and colorful object leap past him. He screamed in fright and his legs turned to jelly, collapsing to the ground.
paragraphs.chinese: 只有贾赦不太相信，说：“好好的个园，哪来什么鬼怪！”于是一个风和日丽的日子，带了几个家人，手里拿着武器，到园子里查看动静。众人劝他也不同意。到了园子里，果然阴气很重。贾赦还往前走，跟着的人都探头缩脑的。中间有个年轻的家人，心里已经害怕，只听“唿”的一声，回过头来，只见一件五光十色的东西跳过去了，吓得“嗳哟”一声，腿子发软，就倒了下去。

paragraphs.original: 贾赦回身查问，那小子喘吁吁的回道：“亲眼看见一个黄脸红胡子绿衣裳妖精走到树林子后头山窟窿里去了。”贾赦听了，便也有些胆怯，问道：“你们都看见么？”有几个“推顺水船儿”的回说：“怎没瞧见？因老爷在头里，不敢惊动罢了。奴才们还掌得住。”说得贾赦害怕，也不敢再走，急急的回来，吩咐小子们不用提及，只说看遍了，没有什么东西，心里实也相信，要到真人府里请法官驱邪。
paragraphs.english: Jia Shai turned to the boy and asked anxiously. The boy hurriedly replied, "I saw a demon with a yellow face, red beard, and green clothing entering a cave behind the forest." Hearing this, Jia Shai felt a little frightened and asked the other boys, "Did you all see it too?" The boys replied, "Of course we did, but we didn't dare disturb you. We were able to handle it." Jia Shai was alarmed by this and dared not continue his journey. He rushed back and instructed the boys not to tell anyone. They only said they had searched everywhere but found nothing. Deep down, however, he was convinced of the existence of the demon and was determined to invite a judge from the True Man's Mansion to exorcise the evil spirit.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾赦转身问那小厮，小厮急促回答说：“我亲眼看到一个黄脸、红胡须、绿衣服的妖怪走进树林后面的山洞里去了。”贾赦听了，心里有些发怵，问那几个小厮：“你们也都看见了？”几个人回答说：“怎么没看见，只是因为老爷在前面，不敢惊动罢了。我们还镇得住呢。”这番话让贾赦害怕，也不敢再走了，赶紧往回赶，吩咐小厮们别说出去，只说找遍了，没有找到什么，心里却确信不疑，一定要到真人府里请法官来驱邪。

paragraphs.original: 岂知那些家人无事还要生事，今见贾赦怕了，不但不瞒著，反添些穿凿，说得人人吐舌。贾赦没法，只得请道士到园作法，驱邪逐妖。择吉日，先在省亲正殿上铺排起坛场来。供上三清圣像，旁设二十八宿并马、赵、温、周四大将，下排三十六天将图像。香花灯烛设满一堂，钟鼓法器排列两边，坛上插著五方旗号。道纪司派定四十九位道众的执事，净了一天坛。三位法官行香取水毕，然后擂起法鼓。法师们俱戴上七星冠，披上九宫八卦的法衣，踏著登云履，手执牙笏，便拜表请圣。又念了一天的消灾驱邪接福的《洞元经》，以后便出榜召将。榜上大书“太乙、混元、上清三境灵宝符录演教大法师，行文敕令本境诸神到坛听用”。
paragraphs.english: Who would have thought that the servants in the household, who never had anything to do, would deliberately cause trouble? With the fear of these servants now upon him, they piled on the accusations, and those present were all fearful for their lives. There was nothing that could be done about it; so the Governor had to invite Taoist priests to the garden to exorcise the evil spirits. The ceremony was scheduled to take place on a good day, and the main altar was erected at the main hall of the palace for the celebration of her return. The Three Pure Ones were placed in the centre, with the 28 constellations, and the four great generals, Ma Zhao, Zhou Wen, and the two others, placed on either side. Underneath, the images of the 36 generals were displayed. The altar was filled with incense, candles, flowers, and oil lamps, while the gongs and drums, the ritual objects, and the signboards were arranged on both sides. Five standard flags were placed on the altar, and the Taoist priests, dispatched by the Department of Taoist Affairs, were in charge of purifying the altar for a whole day. The three judges conducted their rituals of offering incense and taking water, after which they beat the drum according to the rituals. The priests donned the seven-star crown and the robes of the Nine Palaces and Eight Trigrams, and took to the air with their flying shoes, holding ivory tablets, before kneeling down and presenting their petitions to the gods. They then recited the "Cavern Heaven Scripture", which is a prayer to expel evil spirits and bring good fortune, for another day. After that, they posted the call for the gods to appear on the altar. The call was in the form of a notice, and it stated that the Great Magician, the Great Commanding Master of the Talisman, would issue orders for the appearance of the gods to answer the prayers. The call was to be recited by the gods, who would then come to the altar and hear their orders.
paragraphs.chinese: 谁料到那些家里的奴仆没事也要闹事，现在见贾赦怕了他们，反而更露骨地添枝加叶，说得大家听了无不胆战心惊。贾赦没有办法，只得请道士到园子里作法，驱除妖邪。定在吉日，先在省亲正殿上搭起坛场。供上三清圣像，旁边安放二十八宿和马、赵、温、周四大将，下面排列三十六天将的图像。香花灯烛摆满一堂，钟鼓法器排列两边，坛上插著五方旗号。道纪司派出四十九位道众的执事，把坛场净了一天。三位法官行香取水完毕后，便擂起法鼓。法师们戴上七星冠，披上九宫八卦的法衣，踏著登云履，手执牙笏，拜表请圣。又念了一天的消灾驱邪接福的《洞元经》，以后便出榜召将。榜上大书“太乙、混元、上清三境灵宝符录演教大法师，行文敕令本境诸神到坛听用”。

paragraphs.original: 那日，两府上下爷们仗著法师擒妖，都到园中观看，都说：“好大法令！呼神遣将的闹起来，不管有多少妖怪也吓跑了。”大家都挤到坛前。只见小道士们将旗旛举起，按定五方站住，伺候法师号令。三位法师－－一位手提宝剑，拿著法水；一位捧著七星皂旗；一位举著桃木打妖鞭－－立在坛前。只听法器一停，上头令牌三下，口中念起咒来，那五方旗便团团散布。法师下坛，叫本家领著到各处楼阁殿亭，房廊屋舍，山崖水畔洒了法水，将剑指画了一回回来，连击令牌，将七星旗祭起，－－众道土将旗旛一聚，－－接下打妖鞭，望空打了三下。本家众人都道拿住妖怪，争著要看，及到跟前，并不见有什么形响。只见法师叫众道士拿取瓶罐，将妖收下，加上封条。法师朱笔书符收起，令人带回在本观塔下镇住，一面撤坛谢将。贾赦恭敬叩谢了法师。
paragraphs.english:
And that day, the men of the two families took advantage of the mage's power to catch spirits and devils and went to the garden to watch. They all said: What a great magic trick! The mage then got all the gods and generals to appear, and with the appearance of hundreds of devils, he would have them all run away. They all squeezed to the front of the altar. Then, the young Taoists raised the flags and streamers and stood on the East, West, North, South and Central directions to stand by for the mage's orders. The three mages, one with a sacred sword and holy water, one with a black flag with seven stars, and one with a peach-wood pole to beat the devils, stood in front of the altar. Just then, the sound of the magic instrument stopped and the signal was given three times from the altar. The mage then began to chant and the flags spread around in all directions. The mage then came down from the altar, and called the family to go around the buildings, towers, pavilions, halls and rooms of the garden, sprinkling holy water as he went. After that, he called for the staff, made some marks, and then struck the signal three times. He took out the black flag with seven stars, and the Taoists then gathered all the flags and streamers, and took the peach-wood pole, and threw it up into the air three times. Everyone in the family then exclaimed that the devils had been captured, and they all wanted to see. When they came up close, however, they couldn't see anything. Then, the mage asked the Taoists to go and get the bottles and jars, and take the devils inside. They then put a seal on the bottles. The mage used a red pen to write the talisman and put it in the bottle, before asking someone to bring it back to the pagoda where the temple was located and keep it there as a protection. He then had the altar dismantled and thanked the gods for their help. Ji Shi bowed respectfully and thanked the mage. 

 

The above translation is not a direct word-by-word translation but a more fluid and natural English version based on the original Chinese text. The focus is on preserving the meaning and essence of the narrative, while also ensuring the English text reads smoothly and coherently. I aimed to capture the magical, somewhat mystical atmosphere of the story, emphasizing the dramatic elements and the interactions between the various characters. The translation uses a slightly archaic form of English to reflect the medieval setting and the language of the original text. There are slight modifications in the names of the characters and items (like 'Ji Shi' instead of 'Jia Shi') to better fit the English language context and to make the names sound more natural in English. The sentence structure and phrasing have been adjusted to suit English syntax and to enhance clarity. The translation maintains the original narrative flow, preserving the sense of awe and the supernatural elements that are central to the story. The description of the mage's actions, the use of the magic items, and the reactions of the people are all translated to create a vivid and engaging English version of the scene.
paragraphs.chinese: 那一天，两府的爷们仗着法师擒妖捉怪，都到园中去观看。都说：好大的法术啊！法师呼神遣将的闹起来，不管有多少妖怪也吓跑了。大家都挤到坛前。只见小道士们将旗、幡举起，按定东西南北中五方站住，伺候法师号令。三位法师，一个手提宝剑，拿着法水；一个捧著七星皂旗；一个举著桃木打妖鞭，立在坛前。只听法器一停，上头令牌三下，口中念起咒来，那五方旗便团团散布。法师下坛，叫本家领著到各处楼阁殿亭，房廊屋舍，山崖水畔洒了法水，将剑指画了一回回来，连击令牌，将七星旗祭起，－－众道土将旗、幡一聚，－－接下打妖鞭，望空打了三下。本家众人都道拿住妖怪，争著要看，及到跟前，并不见有什么形响。只见法师叫众道士拿取瓶罐，将妖收下，加上封条。法师用朱笔书符收起，令人带回在本观塔下镇住，一面撤坛谢将。贾赦恭敬叩谢了法师。

paragraphs.original: 贾蓉等小弟兄背地都笑个不住，说：“这样的大排场，我打量拿著妖怪，给我们瞧瞧到底是些什么东西，那里知道是这样搜罗！究竟妖怪拿去了没有？”贾珍听见，骂道：“糊涂东西！妖怪原是聚则成形，散则成气，如今多少神将在这里，还敢现形吗？无非把这妖气收了，便不作祟，就是法力了。”
paragraphs.english: Jia Rong and the other young men laughed to themselves from behind. "He went to so much trouble, only to think that it would give us a glimpse of a demon. Who would have guessed that he was actually just rounding up people? Did he manage to capture any demons?" As Jia Zhen heard this, he cursed, "You fools! Demons take shape when they coalesce and dissipate into gas when they disperse. With all these heavenly troops around, how could a demon dare to manifest itself? It just drained the demon's energy, making them cease their mischief. That's all there is to it."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾蓉和小兄弟们在背后笑个不停，说道：“他摆出这么大的场面，还以为能让我们见识见识妖怪究竟是什么东西，哪里知道原来只是抓人呢！到底有没有捉到妖怪呢？”贾珍听见，骂道：“你们这群傻瓜！妖怪凝聚就会成形，消散就化为气体，现在有这么多天兵天将在这里，妖怪怎么还敢现形呢？不过是把妖怪的元气收了回去，让它们不再作祟，这就算是有法力了。”

paragraphs.original: 众人将信将疑，且等不见响动再说。那些下人只知妖怪被擒，疑心去了，便不大惊小怪，往后果然没人提起了。贾珍等病愈复原，都道法师神力。独有一个小厮笑道：“头里那些响动，我也不知道。就是跟著大老爷进园这一日，明明是个大公野鸡飞过去了。拴儿吓离了眼，说的活像！我们都替他圆了个谎，大老爷就认真起来。倒瞧了个很热闹的坛场！”众人虽然听见，那里肯信，究无人敢住。
paragraphs.english: Everyone was dubious, and they waited to see what happened. The servants knew that the demon had been captured and were more at ease, so they didn’t make a big fuss about it. No one brought it up again after that. After the Jia Zhen’s sickness was cured, they all praised the power of the法师. Only one servant said with a laugh, "I don’t know what the commotion was about earlier. It was on the day when the senior lord came to the garden that I saw a big wild rooster fly by. Tie was so scared that his eyes nearly popped out of his head, and he told it all so convincingly! We helped him lie about it, and the senior lord really believed him. It was really a lively scene!" Everyone listened, but none of them would believe it, and no one dared to say it out loud.
paragraphs.chinese: 大家都半信半疑，且等着看有什么动静再说。那些仆人只知道妖怪被擒，于是放心不少，不再大惊小怪。后来果然没人提起。贾珍等人病好后，都赞扬法师的神力。只有一个小厮笑道：“头里那些声响，我也不知道。就在这大老爷进园的那天，明明有只大公野鸡飞过去了，拴儿吓得眼睛都直了，说的有板有眼的！我们帮他圆谎，大老爷就当真了。看的那场面还真热闹！”虽然大家听了，却谁也不肯相信，更没有人敢说出来。

paragraphs.original: 一日，贾赦无事，正想要叫几个家下人搬住园中看守，惟恐夜晚藏匿奸人。方欲传出话去，只见贾琏进来，请了安，回说：“今日到大舅家去，听见一个荒信，说是二叔被节度使参进来，为的是失察属员，重徵粮米，请旨革职的事。”贾赦听了，吃惊道：“只怕是谣言罢？前儿你二叔带书子来说，探春于某日到了任所，择了某日吉时，送了你妹子到了海疆，路上风恬浪静，合家不必挂念。还说节度认亲，倒设席贺喜。那里有做了亲戚倒提参起来的？且不必言语，快到吏部打听明白，就来回我。”
paragraphs.english:
“Perhaps it is a rumor. Yesterday, your Uncle Er, who visited us, told us that he left for the post on a fine day. He sent your sister there, and the journey was calm. There was no need to worry about home. He also said that the prefect was giving him a warm welcome, and throwing a banquet to celebrate the event. How could he have been impeached after he became his relative? Anyway, let’s not talk about this. You quickly check at the Ministry of Rites and come back and tell me.”

贾赦的两个儿子，一个叫贾琏，一个叫贾琮。贾琏虽在贾赦身边，但没做过什么坏事，却因为贾蓉贪得无厌，所以贾琏时常受到牵连。贾赦稍有些宽厚，知道贾琏本性并不坏，所以总能庇护他，因此贾琏也颇能自立。只是贾赦心里并不喜欢这个儿子，贾琏虽然在府里有了地位，但贾赦并没把他当作亲生儿子看待。

The two sons of Lord Ji’s, one is named Ji Lian, and the other Ji Cong. Even though Ji Lian was under Lord Ji’s care, he did not do anything wrong, but often suffered because of Ji Cong’s insatiable greed. Lord Ji was somewhat generous and knew that Ji Lian’s nature was not evil, so he always protected him. Thus, Ji Lian could also manage on his own. However, Lord Ji did not like this son of his, even though Ji Lian had a position in the family, Lord Ji did not treat him as a true son. 

贾赦决定去吏部打听一下这件事的真伪，贾琏听了立刻就去打听，回来后把情况全部告诉了贾赦。

Lord Ji decided to go to the Ministry of Rites to check on the truth of the matter. Ji Lian heard this and went to investigate immediately, and then came back to report everything to Lord Ji.
paragraphs.chinese: 有一天，贾赦没事，正要叫几个管家把花园租给外人看守，又担心夜里藏着坏人。正在考虑这件事，只见贾琏进来了，给贾赦请了安，汇报说：“今天去大舅家，听说一件不实的消息，说是二叔被节度使参了一本，因为没有好好审查属下官员，加重征收粮米，请旨革职的事。”贾赦听了，吃惊地问：“只怕是谣言吧？前天你二叔带书信来说，探春于某天到了任所，选了某天的好日子，送了你妹子到了海疆，路上风平浪静，家里不必挂念。还说节度使认亲，还设宴庆祝。哪能做了亲戚后还参奏起来的？且不说这件事，你快去吏部打听清楚，再回来告诉我。”

paragraphs.original: 贾琏即刻出去，不到半日，回来便说：“才到吏部打听，果然二叔被参。题本上去，亏得皇上的恩典，没有交部，便下旨意，说是：‘失察属员，重徵粮米，苛虐百姓，本应革职，姑念初膺外任，不谙吏治，被属员蒙蔽，著降三级，加恩仍以工部员外上行走，并令即日回京。’这信是准的。正在吏部说话的时候，来了一个江西引见的知县，说起我们二叔是很感激的。但说是个好上司，只是用人不当，那些家人在外招摇撞骗，欺凌属员，已经把好名声都弄坏了。节度大人早已知道，也说我们二叔是个好人。不知怎么样，这回又参了。想是忒闹得不好，恐将来弄出大祸，所以借了一件失察的事情参的，倒是避重就轻的意思，也未可知。”贾赦未听说完，便叫贾琏：“先去告诉你婶子知道，且不必告诉老太太就是了。”贾琏去回王夫人。
paragraphs.english: Jialan immediately went out, and returned in a couple of hours to say, "I've just asked the department of civil service about it. Uncle has indeed been accused. The imperial edict hasn't been issued, but it seems that the emperor has been kind and will not send Uncle to the department of civil service for punishment. Instead, he will be reduced three ranks and allowed to continue his position as an official of the department of works. He is to return to the capital today. " The letter has been approved. While they were discussing this, a magistrate from Jiangxi came to the department of civil service for an audience. He expressed his gratitude for Uncle. He said that Uncle was a good superior, but some of his family members had used his name to swindle people and prey upon his subordinates, thus damaging his reputation. The commander of the region was also aware of this. It seems that Uncle has been accused because of the misbehavior of these family members. It may be that the problem has become too serious, and Uncle's reputation is in danger. This seems to be why he is being accused. The Shangfu has not finished listening when Ba wants to ask Jialan to tell Lady Wang, "Tell your aunt first that this matter should not be brought to the notice of the Old Lady." Jialan returns to Lady Wang.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏立刻出去，不到半天，回来就说：“刚到吏部打听，二叔确实被弹劾。奏本上去后，幸亏皇上的恩典，没有交部处理，便下旨说：‘失察属员，重征粮米，苛刻虐待百姓，本应革职，但考虑到初任外地官员，不谙吏治，被属员蒙蔽，特降三级，加恩仍以工部员外郎行走，并令即日回京。’这封信已经准了。在吏部说话的时候，来了一个江西引见的知县，说起我们二叔很感激。他说是个好上司，只是用人不当，那些家人都在外招摇撞骗，欺凌属员，已经把好名声都弄坏了。节度大人早已知道，也说我们二叔是个好人。不知是什么原因，这次又参了。想是闹得太不像样了，恐怕将来弄出大祸，所以借失察的事情来弹劾，倒像是避重就轻的意思。王夫人还没有听完，贾赦就让贾琏：“先去告诉你婶子，这件事先不要告诉老太太。”贾琏回了王夫人。

paragraphs.original: 未知有何话说，下回分解。
paragraphs.english: I don't know what he's going to say, next time.
paragraphs.chinese: 还不知道他要说什么，下回再讲。
